-- Switchblade --

Switchblade completes Perceptor's head, a perhaps simple design, but 
with the current resources, it would suffice. He had no optics 
available, and didn't want to spend the time to make them, so he had 
implanted a infrared sensor to do for the moment.

He places the head onto Perceptor's upper torso, and brushes off his 
hands. "Hmmm..." His precise hands open Perceptor's chest 
compartment, and he attaches several cords to specific locations. He 
then connects those cords to a machine that resembles an electric 
chair. Switchblade sits in the chair, and draws a few more cords to 
him and attaches them to the back of his neck, and to his chest.

A few of Nightstrike's strong thoughts of escape nudge at his 
concentration, but he shrugs them off, <Later Nightstrike, I've got 
more important things to attend to...>.

A few key memories need to be deleted from Perceptor's mind. 
Switchblade was about to dive in, and make the necessary 
corrections. The green glow leaves his optics, and the battle of the 
mind begins between Perceptor and Switchblade.
